down loaded it today and it worked perfect... and really fast too....for those of you who are having trouble you need to have a program like winzip or something to unpack it and then simply install.... the installation application should be the one right at the very bottom in the unzipped folder... just double click and follow the instructions and thats it.... worked perfect for me and its totally ligit no activation keys or anything needed and it up dates perfectly from windows as a genuine product... * my os is 7 64bit*

With or without internet connection this torrent needs some instructions how to activate. There are comments like: yeah great , this and that...How do you check if the product is activated? Just because it doesn't require serial key? Open Word, click on File ( left upper corner), then on Help..read what it stands on the right pane. If it stands Product Activated ...I'll buy you a night with Paris Hilton. 
The only way to activate MSO 2010 Pro + is through the phone. EZ doesn't work anymore. And if you need instructions How To, it would be mrriser007 who need to ask me first !
